turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Nicholas Lore.
turn.2: Nicholas Lore Nicholas Ayars “Nick” Lore is a social scientist specializing in career design methodology and multiple intelligences, author, and the founder of the Rockport Institute.
turn.3: What is unique about his methodology?
turn.4: His methodology includes a system of step-by-step inquiry during which people achieve certainty about their unique expression of those key elements.
turn.5: Is there anything else that is interesting?
turn.6: This methodology also includes a suite of tools and inquiries to deal with the doubts, fears and uncertainties that arise.
turn.7: What do others say about him?
turn.8: A central concept of his work states that too many people concentrate their career goals on extrinsic rewards such as high salary and prestige and unnecessarily sacrifice intrinsic values such as job satisfaction.
turn.10: He asserts that a well-chosen career will provide both.
turn.11: When did he become the founder of Rockport Institute?
turn.12: Lore founded the Rockport Institute in 1981.
